text:
We should check the number of voxels in the mask at the end of a mask-extraction routine and issue a customized warning to the user if the number of voxels is either 0 or total size of the array.

The warning should be added at the end of compute_epi_mask, compute_multi_epi_mask, compute_background_mask, compute_multi_background_mask.

The warning should be explicit that "Automatic mask computation has failed on image %s". It should provide common problems and their solutions for instance: using compute_epi on images that are not EPI, or vice versa, or using compute_epi on images that were detrended, centered or variance normalized.
title: ENH: add a warning in mask-extraction routines when the fail
